title: [Self-Directed] PowerPoint Multimodal Integration Pedagogy: Mathematics Lecture Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics concepts and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Application of multimodal integration strategies to enhance learners' comprehension in online lecture environments aimed at strengthening mathematical job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the meaningful linkage between slide text and lecture audio with 80% accuracy.
Learners can differentiate and apply modality integration techniques in the "referent" and "scaffolding" styles to practical tasks.
Learners can produce multimodal slide materials for explaining mathematical concepts in three or more formats.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
